00014 #include "pulserdriverh8.h"
00015 #include "charinterface.h"
00016 
00017 REGISTER_TYPE(XDriverList, H8Pulser, "NMR pulser handmade-H8");
00018 
00019 #define MAX_PATTERN_SIZE 2048u
00020 //[ms]
00021 #define TIMER_PERIOD (1.0/(25.0e3))
00022 //[ms]
00023 #define MIN_PULSE_WIDTH 0.001
00024 
00025 double XH8Pulser::resolution() const {
00026     return TIMER_PERIOD;
00027 }
00028 double XH8Pulser::minPulseWidth() const {
00029     return MIN_PULSE_WIDTH;
00030 }
00031 
00032 XH8Pulser::XH8Pulser(const char *name, bool runtime,
00033                      const shared_ptr<XScalarEntryList> &scalarentries,
00034                      const shared_ptr<XInterfaceList> &interfaces,
00035                      const shared_ptr<XThermometerList> &thermometers,
00036                      const shared_ptr<XDriverList> &drivers) :
00037     XCharDeviceDriver<XPulser>(name, runtime, scalarentries, interfaces, thermometers, drivers)
00038 {
00039     interface()->setEOS("\r\n");
00040     interface()->setSerialBaudRate(115200);
00041     interface()->setSerialStopBits(2);
00042     
00043     const int ports[] = {
00044         PORTSEL_GATE, PORTSEL_PREGATE, PORTSEL_TRIG1, PORTSEL_TRIG2,
00045         PORTSEL_QPSK_A, PORTSEL_QPSK_B, PORTSEL_ASW, PORTSEL_UNSEL,
00046         PORTSEL_PULSE1, PORTSEL_PULSE2, PORTSEL_COMB, PORTSEL_UNSEL,
00047         PORTSEL_QPSK_OLD_PSGATE, PORTSEL_QPSK_OLD_NONINV, PORTSEL_QPSK_OLD_INV, PORTSEL_COMB_FM
00048     };
00049     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < sizeof(ports)/sizeof(int); i++) {
00050         portSel(i)->value(ports[i]);
00051     }
00052 
00053 }
00054 void
00055 XH8Pulser::open() throw (XInterface::XInterfaceError &)
00056 {  
00057     start();
00058 }
00059 
00060 void
00061 XH8Pulser::createNativePatterns()
00062 {
00063     m_zippedPatterns.clear();
00064     for(RelPatListIterator it = m_relPatList.begin(); it != m_relPatList.end(); it++)
00065     {
00066         pulseAdd(it->toappear, (uint16_t)(it->pattern & PAT_DO_MASK));
00067     }
00068 }
00069 int
00070 XH8Pulser::pulseAdd(uint64_t term, uint16_t pattern)
00071 {
00072     C_ASSERT(sizeof(long long) == 8);
00073 
00074     term = std::max(term, (uint64_t)lrint(MIN_PULSE_WIDTH / TIMER_PERIOD));
00075 
00076     uint32_t ulen = (uint32_t)((term - 1) / 0x8000uLL);
00077     uint32_t llen = (uint32_t)((term - 1) % 0x8000uLL);
00078 
00079     switch(ulen)
00080     {
00081         h8ushort x;
00082     case 0:
00083         x.msb = llen / 0x100;
00084         x.lsb = llen % 0x100;
00085         m_zippedPatterns.push_back(x);
00086         x.msb = pattern / 0x100;
00087         x.lsb = pattern % 0x100;
00088         m_zippedPatterns.push_back(x);
00089         break;
00090     default:
00091         x.msb = (ulen % 0x8000u + 0x8000u) / 0x100;
00092         x.lsb = (ulen % 0x8000u + 0x8000u) % 0x100;
00093         m_zippedPatterns.push_back(x);
00094         x.msb = (ulen / 0x8000u) / 0x100;
00095         x.lsb = (ulen / 0x8000u) % 0x100;
00096         m_zippedPatterns.push_back(x);
00097         x.msb = (llen + 0x8000u) / 0x100;
00098         x.lsb = (llen + 0x8000u) % 0x100;
00099         m_zippedPatterns.push_back(x);
00100         x.msb = pattern / 0x100;
00101         x.lsb = pattern % 0x100;
00102         m_zippedPatterns.push_back(x);
00103         break;
00104     }
00105     return 0;
00106 }
00107 static uint16_t makesum(unsigned char *start, uint32_t bytes)
00108 {
00109     uint16_t sum = 0;
00110 
00111     for(; bytes > 0; bytes--)
00112         sum += *start++;
00113     return sum;
00114 }
00115 void
00116 XH8Pulser::changeOutput(bool output, unsigned int blankpattern)
00117 {
00118     if(output)
00119     {
00120         if(m_zippedPatterns.empty() |
00121            (m_zippedPatterns.size() >= MAX_PATTERN_SIZE ))
00122             throw XInterface::XInterfaceError(i18n("Pulser Invalid pattern"), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00123         for(unsigned int retry = 0; ; retry++) {
00124             try {
00125                 interface()->sendf("$poff %x", blankpattern);
00126                 interface()->send("$pclear");
00127                 unsigned int size = m_zippedPatterns.size();
00128                 unsigned int pincr = size;
00129                 interface()->sendf("$pload %x %x", size, pincr);
00130                 interface()->receive();
00131                 interface()->write(">", 1);
00132                 msecsleep(1);
00133                 for(unsigned int j=0; j < size; j += pincr)
00134                 {
00135                     interface()->write(
00136                         (char *)&m_zippedPatterns[j], pincr * 2);
00137                     uint16_t sum = 
00138                         makesum((unsigned char *)&m_zippedPatterns[j], pincr * 2);
00139                     h8ushort nsum;
00140                     nsum.lsb = sum % 0x100; nsum.msb = sum / 0x100;
00141                     interface()->write((char *)&nsum, 2);
00142                 }
00143                 interface()->write("    \n", 5);
00144                 interface()->receive();
00145                 unsigned int ret;
00146                 if(interface()->scanf("%x", &ret) != 1)
00147                     throw XInterface::XConvError(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00148                 if(ret != size)
00149                     throw XInterface::XInterfaceError(i18n("Pulser Check Sum Error"), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00150             }
00151             catch (XKameError &e) {
00152                 if(retry > 0) throw e;
00153                 e.print(getLabel() + ": " + i18n("try to continue") + ", ");
00154                 continue;
00155             }
00156             break;
00157         }
00158     }
00159     else
00160     {
00161         interface()->sendf("$poff %x", blankpattern);
00162     }
00163 }
